generated_text:
- road: The image shows a wide paved surface with lane markings, clearly designated for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: The curb and stone bollards on the right side of the image indicate a pedestrian area adjacent to the road.
- building: Multiple multi-story structures with windows and architectural features are visible throughout the image.
- wall: A large white wall with text is visible on the right side of the image.
- pole: Several vertical poles are visible, including one with traffic signs and another supporting a traffic light.
- traffic light: A red traffic light is visible above the road, controlling the flow of traffic.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including a triangular warning sign and a circular "no entry" sign.
- vegetation: Trees with green leaves are visible along the sidewalks and in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings, appearing partly cloudy.
- person: Several pedestrians can be seen walking on the sidewalks in the background.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road, including a white sedan and a red car.
- bus: A red double-decker bus with the text "Stadtrundfahrt" is visible in the distance.
- motorcycle: No motorcycles are visible in the image.
- bicycle: No bicycles are visible in the image.
- train: No trains are visible in the image.
